name: Light Way (ShadowTheDragon)
description:
MADE FOR THE GMTK Game Jam - 2019.

Inspired by the movie TRON.

Summary: You have only one life, no respawning. Their is only one enemy, but he just won't die. And you can only attack ONCE...with one path to escape and one chance, can you survive the halls of the Nuclear Facility?

Description: The game is a top down semi-survival based game based upon surviving the enemy, who you can only attack once...but he will come back, he always does.

Their is only ONE level, but the level randomizes the basic path to win every time its booted up, either opening or closing certain doors, making it to where you can't just follow one straight path to victory...well, if you can call it that.

You are in a position of weakness, you can fight back only one time and even then, it won't kill the enemy...but he can certainly kill you! All you can do is evade or run from the enemy, either choosing to collect points or ignore them in choice to escape.

With your path to victory constantly changing and points lying through the map, can you find all FOUR endings and survive?
